mapper.prompt: Input audio language is Ukrainian only, not russian. Remove all unnecessary sounds or thinking as ```–ê–∞–∞...```, ```–ê –¥–∞–ª—ñ....```. Remove all triple dots.

mapper.message: Summarize a message about my day. The message is: {{2.text}}

Create a comprehensive and valuable analysis of this person's message: {{2.text}}. Your role is to deeply analyze their emotional tone, behavior, and mindset, offering constructive feedback that is both motivational and actionable.
